document_data.mainbody:
ristram Cymrych was High King of the Moonshae Isles for a year in the late 5 century DR.
He was a member of the Cymrych Dynasty and the first son of his predecessor, High King Kemble. His successor was his own first son, Tuathal Cymrych.
Tristram assumed the throne of the High King in the , after the death of his father.
He ruled for just a year before dying of disease in the .
